title: Freelancer Client Portal
description: I build a custom client portal to increase
content:
A healthy freelancer-client relationship can't exist without trust. But trust can't be created out of thin air.

You don't trust me yet. Despite the fact that you probably came via word-of-mouth, and despite the fact that I have tons of information for you to comb through... you can't *really* trust me until you build your *own* experience with me.

And I don't trust you yet. Despite how much I might like your personality, your project, and your story... I can't *really* trust you until I build my *own* experience with you.

So what do we do?

Well... we 

## When my clock is on, my camera is on.


## Control Your Wallet
Set daily, weekly, and total spend limits. Also hit the STOP NOW button at any time and you won't be billed another cent.
